name: Seota Digital Marketing
tagline: Award Winning WordPress Designs | SEO & Dev Agency
description:
Seota Digital Marketing is a full-service digital agency specializing in web traffic & lead generation via website design, SEO, Marketing Automation, PPC and Paid Social ads. Located in Frisco, Texas since 2009.
We are focused on executing internet marketing strategies that create measurable results for our clients and an entrepreneurial and creative environment for our team members. We believe in only helping businesses owners that we like and respect and we take pride in our client’s success.
Setoa has a fantastic record of keeping our clients happy. Some clients come to us for web design and development and some retain us for monthly marketing and SEO. Both types of clients get our best effort every time.
If you are ready to see dramatic improvement in what your website can do to help your business, call us today!
Our eCommerce team that has expertise in Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento and OpenCart. We also build custom eCommerce software platforms.
